Articles.Content: I have been trying to add MJ2 to my command capsules, without success. i have downloaded the spaceport file that supposedly adds MJ to all of the command objects, but they are still not appearing. I thought there may be an issue with syntax, so i replace the standard mechjebcore with the mechjebar202 in the .cfg files of the items in the hope that would cure it, no joy. What changes need to be in place and where to add the functionality of MJ to the standard command vessels? Thank you for any assistance you are able to render.

It's really just config editing. I believe Mechjeb 2 is a .cfg module (check a mechjeb 2 enabled part), then copy the bit from the module area if it is and simply past it into the pod's config. Hope this helps.

Send a Kerbal

Edited June 6, 2013 by dr_jt

Found out I was editing the wrong files. With the filesystem changes in .20, the modules are in a different directory, not parts. The file on spaceport does work, as long as you put in the correct directory. Thanks for the assistance.
